homePageText.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Diagnostics (Preview)
homePageText.description: Use Azure Kubernetes Service Diagnostics (Preview) to investigate how your cluster is performing, diagnose issues, and discover how to improve its reliability. Select the problem category that best matches the information or tool that you're interested in:
homePageText.searchBarPlaceHolder: Search a keyword that best describes your issue

categories.name: Known Issues, Availability and Performance
categories.description: This category help address performance issues that are related latency, upgrade, pods, configuration and scale

categories.name: Connectivity Issues
categories.description: This category help address networking and connectivity issues on cluster subnet configuration, DNS, FQDN etc.

categories.name: Create, Upgrade, Delete and Scale
categories.description: Do you have questions during create, upgrade, delete and scale your clusters? Leverage this category to help you move your cluster smoothly

categories.name: Identity and Security
categories.description: Do you have troubles on identity and security configurations or issues? Check here out to find solutions that help you solve AAD, Certificate, Access or Identity problems.

categories.name: Best Practices
categories.description: This category is showing you best practices for your clusters on auto-scalling, manage security policies, set up DNS and subnets, configure route table and IP ranges, etc..

categories.name: Node Health
categories.description: Is your cluster experiencing failures or unresponsiveness on nodes? Investigate and discover issues that related to nodes, node pools, etc..
